HERO_TITLE: Blockchain Authenticated Covid-PCR and Vaccination Certificates
HERO_SUBTITLE: Fast and secure check-in with digitally authenticated data available via API. Check it digitally before the passenger leaves home.
BUILD_FOR_SUBTITLE: Covid PCR Exams, Vaccines and Medical Certificates with inserted by licensed health professionals.
BUILD_FOR_SUBTITLE_ITEM_1: Fast process, no queues, no crowds at the airport. Direct integration allows issuance of eBoarding Pass in advance.
BUILD_FOR_SUBTITLE_ITEM_2: Data authenticated and verified via blockchain, with API, web or mobile interface for remote operations.
BUILD_FOR_SUBTITLE_ITEM_3: Enhance the generation of ancillary revenues by offering more convenience to the passenger.
PRIVACY_SUBTITLE: Immunie is a privacy by design application, built to meet the highest global standards of data privacy. It was built to exceed the requirements of the UK Data Protection Act (2018), the General Data Protection Regulation in Europe (GDPR EU 2016/679) and California Data Protection Act (CDPA / 2018).
HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE: A direct and secure connection between the medical data issuer and the airline servers under the passenger's consent.
HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE_ITEM_1: The passenger takes his Covid-PCR test or receives the necessary vaccine to travel.
HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE_ITEM_2: The test result or vaccine data with batch number and timestamp is updated automatically.
HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE_ITEM_3: The passenger opt-in associating the results with his eTICKET, via API, allowing his authentication and issuance of the eBoarding Pass.
HOW_TO_USE_SUBTITLE: Make your life easier with Immunie. No paper, no worries.
HOW_TO_USE_TITLE_ITEM_1: Exam results shared directly in your API with the security of Blockchain authentication
HOW_TO_USE_TITLE_ITEM_2: Electronic International Vaccination Certificates is issued in following the WHO ICV Yellow Card template.
HOW_TO_USE_TITLE_ITEM_3: Eliminate the risk of editing results presented on paper or PDF files.
HOW_TO_USE_RIGTH_CARD_1_SUBTITLE: See how integration takes place, step by step in our catalog for the passenger transport sector.
HOW_TO_USE_RIGTH_CARD_2_TITLE: Test the system from data entry to authentication via Blockchain
BLOCKCHAIN_TECH_SUBTITLE: The authentication of vaccination records inserted in your Immunie Digital Vaccination and Health Wallet uses two levels of encryption to guarantee the authenticity of the data, preserving user's privacy.
INTEGRATION_SUBTITLE: We work with the best technology and the best service providers in the global market.
INTEGRATION_ITEM_1_SUBTITLE: We are proud to be part of the 2020-2021 edition of the London Business School Incubator, one of the best business schools in the world.
INTEGRATION_ITEM_2_SUBTITLE: The most secure, comprehensive and reliable global cloud infrastructure for applications.
INTEGRATION_ITEM_3_SUBTITLE: Progressive Web Apps represents one of the biggest bets for companies like Google and Microsoft for the future.
STORY_GRID_1_SUBTITLE: We are a start up selected for the London Business School incubator, edition 2020-2021. Our company was created with the mission of saving lives by helping people, health professionals and public health managers to use technology to better control serious diseases that can be prevented by vaccines.
STORY_GRID_2_SUBTITLE: With your data up to date, reminders and alerts on your smartphone and an always-updated calendar, you know what to do to be always protected, always Immunie;)
REVIEWS_TITLE: We work with the best technology and the best service providers in the global market
REVIEWS_ITEM_1_AUTHOR_FEEDBACK: We are proud to be part of the 2020-2021 edition of the London Business School Incubator, one of the best business schools in the world.
REVIEWS_ITEM_2_AUTHOR_FEEDBACK: Progressive Web Apps represents one of the biggest bets for companies like Google and Microsoft for the future.
